data.text:
@SalmanNizami_ @BDUTT Salmon tereko thoda kamich aakal hai na wo tu har baar pelta rehta hai har jagah.
Randy rona har baar ka chalu rehta hai tera.
Jumla gamla vimla bimla shimla. Bass karna.
🤣🤣🤣
Is this reply in your language to understand or should disrespect more to your level of understanding.

@SalmanNizami_ @BDUTT Will not forget those horrifying days.. Will also not forget #ArnabGoswami sickly comment on a fellow journalist.
 
@BDUTT Did you write about that too.. If you hadnt, I wish you did... That below the belt from a fellow journalist should have been well documented

@SalmanNizami_ @Chikisarkar @BDUTT https://t.co/G2smiwsqaX Click this link

राह पे चल बंदेया
